title: Something big in micro circuits
creator_credit: Film Producers Guild, Katrina Rank, G. Buckland-Smith and Tony Baker
brief_description: A detailed look at the vast field of the diminuitive. Animated sequences showing the various etching and photographic processes needed to produce transistors and other miniaturised equipment are described in detail.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Producers Guild, Katrina Rank, G. Buckland-Smith and Tony Baker
